name: Chasm (v0.51)
description:
Chasm is a small dungeon demo for a 3D action-adventure role-playing game inspired by early 3D Legend of Zelda and Dark Souls. It features a fully-completable dungeon filled with spooky monsters and puzzles. The goal is to fight through waves of enemies to open up the dungeon’s ‘Chasm’ using quick sword strikes, well-timed dodges and blocks, and well-placed arrows. This likely won’t become a large commercial product, but I hope to continue to polish this demo up to a 1.0 release!
